markdown:
| icon           = poe2 boots_07 icon.png
| description    = These riding boots are crafted from fine, embroidered leather. They once belonged to the Dyrwoodan erl Fenan Cört - a man known as a proud military commander, accomplished huntsman, and a lover of dance. Though sturdy and practical, they are also exceedingly comfortable. The sprung toes allow for easy, rounded steps and the heels offer good support. Brass hobnails provide solid traction and allow for more athletic endeavors than the luxurious-looking footwear would suggest.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Feet

| internalname   = Boots_U_Fenans_Finery
| location       = * Looted from [Lueva Alvari](/luevaAlvari/)'s body after killing her in her office in the [Vailian Trading Company Headquarters](/vailianTradingCompanyHeadquarters/). They cannot be pickpocketed.
| guid           = 3aa83b79-a994-4415-b3ff-4a907238274e
}}
